questions.question: What is the title of the article that discusses the complexation chemistry of bismuth(III) halides?
questions.answer: Complexation chemistry of bismuth(III) halides with crown ethers and polyethylene glycols. Structural manifestations of a stereochemically active lone pair

questions.question: Who are the authors of the article published on the complexation chemistry of bismuth(III) halides?
questions.answer: Robin D. Rogers, Andrew H. Bond, Salvador Aguinaga, Alain Reyes

questions.question: In which journal was the article on bismuth(III) halides complexation chemistry published?
questions.answer: Journal of the American Chemical Society
